title: The Principles and applications of atomic spectra
creator_credit: Katrina Rank and Rank Audio Visual
brief_description: The film begins with a brief summary of the electromagnetic spectrum, and then makes the point that when electrons in atoms lose or gain energy, radiation with wavelengths ranging from the X-ray to the near infra-red region is emitted or absorbed.
